content: this is a summary of a legal case involving two parties the case has reached the court of appeal after going through the court of first instance the case involves a dispute over the division of property between a divorced couple the court has made a decision regarding the division of properties including real estate parcels and cash the court has dismissed certain claims made by the parties and has ordered payments to be made by the defendants the defendants have filed an appeal against the judgment but the court of appeal has found the appeal to be unfounded and has upheld the original judgment the court has also ordered the defendants to pay the costs of the appeal proceedings the court has considered the contributions made by both parties in determining the division of property the court has also addressed issues related to the burden of proof and the assessment of evidence the court of appeal has reviewed the case and has dismissed the appeal the court has provided reasons for its decision and has ordered the defendants to pay the costs of the appeal proceedings the text also mentions various legal principles and laws that have been applied in the case overall the court has made a final decision regarding the division of property between the parties involved in the case

metadata.CASE_ID: Sodba Višjega sodišča v Ljubljani II Cp 2060/2021, 5. 4. 2022
